means: 麦卡锡主义（指美国共和党参议员J.R.McCarthy于1951-1954年间发动的反共以及迫害民主进步力量的法西斯行经）

sentence.Network_en: At that time, however, McCarthyism prevailed in the United States.
sentence.Network_cn: 但当时, 美国麦卡锡主义盛行.

sentence.Network_en: Schrecker, Ellen . No Ivory Tower: McCarthyism and the Universities . 1986.
sentence.Network_cn: 《没有象牙塔: 麦卡锡主义和大学》1986.

sentence.Network_en: Many are the Crimes: McCarthyism in America . 1998.
sentence.Network_cn: 《许多是罪犯: 美国麦卡锡主义》1998.

PerfectNetExp.abs: McCarthyism and China Studies in the United States麦卡锡主义与美国中国学研究

means.word_mean: 1. unscrupulously accusing people of disloyalty (as by saying they were Communists)
